front.title: Maximally Redundant Trees Fast Reroute using Segment Routing

abstract.t: This document presents a mechanism aimed at providing segment routing forwarding option for MRT-FRR. It defines five new MRT Profiles, each using SR-LSP, SR-tunnel, etc., forwarding option respectively. These MRT Profiles will be very useful in the case of segment routing network without LDP deployed. On the other hand, MRT-FRR is also a competitive solution comparing with others for segment routing network.
